Christopher Wray Says He'll Step Down as F.B.I. Director  —  The F.B.I. director, Christopher A. Wray, told bureau employees on Wednesday that he intended in January, bowing to the reality that President-elect Donald J. Trump had publicly declared his desire to replace him.

Schumer torpedoed by Manchin and Sinema on crucial NLRB vote … - Schumer gambled that he had the votes without knowing how Sens. Kyrsten Sinema (I-Ariz.) and Joe Manchin (I-W.Va.) would vote on the nomination for Lauren McFerran.  — Both voted “No” on a crucial procedural vote that would clear the way for confirmation.
